verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--bhaṭṭa, tumi nā kariha saṁśaya
'svayaṁ-bhagavān' kṛṣṇa ei ta' niścaya

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; bhaṭṭa—My dear Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa; tumi—you; nā kariha—do not do; saṁśaya—doubt; svayam-bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; kṛṣṇa—is Lord Kṛṣṇa; ei ta' niścaya—this is the conclusion.
translation: The Lord then continued, "My dear Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa, please do not continue doubting. Lord Kṛṣṇa is the Supreme Personality of Godhead, and this is the conclusion of the Vedic literature.
